item.title: For the Test
item.description: Here are some notes from the review session on Monday night: Make sure that you look for the key words in the questions like sum or average. Take your time and sketch out what information you need, where itâ€™s coming from, and how to get it. Remeber that scatter plots are two sets of data, timeseries are scatterplots with x being time, histograms are one set of data, and bar plots are two sets of data, with one being a factor.
